long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview:
DictionaryX | Ai✨ is your go-to Chrome extension for quick and accurate word definitions, making language barriers a thing of the past. Double-click any text on a webpage, and instantly get its definition in your preferred language. With support for text detection in 160 languages and definitions in 21 languages, DictionaryX | Ai✨ is the ultimate tool for students, professionals, and language enthusiasts.

Key Features:
Instant Definitions: Simply double-click any word on a webpage to get its definition.
Multi-Language Support: Detects text in 260 languages and provides definitions in 27 languages.
User-Friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive design ensures a seamless user experience.
Advanced Technology: Utilizes cutting-edge AI to provide precise and contextually accurate definitions.
Customizable Settings: Choose your preferred definition language for a personalized experience.
Lightweight and Fast: Optimized for quick performance without slowing down your browser.

Why DictionaryX | Ai✨?
Eliminate Language Barriers: Perfect for learning new languages or understanding foreign content.
Boost Productivity: Quickly look up words without leaving your current webpage.
Enhance Vocabulary: Improve your language skills with accurate definitions at your fingertips.

How to Use:
Install DictionaryX | Ai✨ from the Chrome Web Store.
Double-click any word on a webpage.
Instantly view the definition in your chosen language.
Support and Feedback:
We value your feedback! For support or to share your suggestions, contact us at sasi.bhumaraju@gmail.com.
